alldb.table_sql:
select max(ci.contract_id) as contractid, max(ci.contract_number) as contractnumber, sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cp.plan_date<=to_char(sysdate+30,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.rent else 0 end ) rent30, sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cp.plan_date<=to_char(sysdate+30,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.corpus else 0 end ) corpus30, sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cp.plan_date<=to_char(sysdate+30,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.interest else 0 end ) interest30,
sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate+30,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cp.plan_date<=to_char(sysdate+90,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.rent else 0 end ) rent90, sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate+30,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cp.plan_date<=to_char(sysdate+90,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.corpus else 0 end ) corpus90, sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate+30,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cp.plan_date<=to_char(sysdate+90,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.interest else 0 end ) interest90,
sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate+90,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cp.plan_date<=to_char(sysdate+180,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.rent else 0 end ) rent180, sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate+90,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cp.plan_date<=to_char(sysdate+180,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.corpus else 0 end ) corpus180, sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate+90,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cp.plan_date<=to_char(sysdate+180,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.interest else 0 end ) interest180,
sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate+180,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cp.plan_date<=to_char(sysdate+360,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.rent else 0 end ) rent360, sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate+180,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cp.plan_date<=to_char(sysdate+360,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.corpus else 0 end ) corpus360, sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate+180,'yyyy-mm-dd') and cp.plan_date<=to_char(sysdate+360,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.interest else 0 end ) interest360,
sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate+360,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.rent else 0 end ) thanrent360, sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate+360,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.corpus else 0 end ) thancorpus360, sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate+360,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.interest else 0 end ) thaninterest360,
sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.rent else 0 end ) allrent, sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.corpus else 0 end ) allcorpus, sum(case when cp.plan_date>to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') then cp.interest else 0 end ) allinterest
From contract_fund_rent_plan cp left join contract_info ci on cp.contract_id=ci.id where 1=1 /~contractid: and ci.contract_id like '%{contractid}%' ~/ /~contractnumber: and ci.contract_number like '%{contractnumber}%' ~/ group by cp.contract_id
